Body:
TubeDetector = TubeDetector1D(position=(1.0, 0.0, 1.0), direction=(1.0, 0, 
    0), length=0.5, pixels=5)
positions = TubeDetector.getPixelPositions()
AssumedPositions = np.array([[0.8, 0, 1], [0.9, 0, 1], [1.0, 0, 1], [1.1, 0,
    1], [1.2, 0, 1]])
print(positions)
print(AssumedPositions)
assert np.all(AssumedPositions == positions)
